import React from "react"; import ExperienceCard from "../utils/ExperienceCard"; const Experience = () => { return (

Experience

Developed and maintained dynamic, responsive web applications using React JS for the front end and Django for the backend, delivering high-quality solutions to clients , <> Implemented clean, reusable, and modular code using React components and hooks, resulting in a 20% increase {" "} in efficiency. , <> Utilized Django's powerful features, such as ORM and REST framework , to build scalable and secure backend systems, handling over {" "} 10,000 monthly requests. , <> Integrated React with Django using RESTful APIs, ensuring seamless communication between the front end and backend. , <> Collaborated with a team of 3+ back-end developers and web designers to improve usability, achieving a 15% increase in user satisfaction. ]} skills={[ "REact JS", "Django", "Cloud Deployment", "RESTful APIs", ]} /> Used{" "} YOLO object detection and classification using {" "} CNN and Pose Estimation to achieve 90% accuracy on video based camera feed. , ]} skills={[ "Python", "Optimization", "Object Detection", "Pose Estimation", "PyTorch", ]} /> Developed and maintained a dashboard for real-time sensor data mapping {" "} 10,000+ rows of data 24/7 dashboard using {" "} Python and Django , <> Utilized Intel OpenVINO toolkit to run deep learning models on GPU for high density sensor data . , ]} skills={["Python", "OpenVINO", "Django", "Matplotlib"]} />
); }; export default Experience;
